info.name: Intucate SQI API
info.description: API endpoints for the Intucate Diagnostic Agent SQI system

request.description: Save the diagnostic agent prompt to the server
Retrieve the saved diagnostic agent prompt

body.raw:

request.description: Compute SQI for student attempts and generate Summary Customizer Agent payload
